args.natural_language_statement:
Translate the following and check correctness: Every finite simple group is isomorphic to one of the following groups: (1) A cyclic group of prime order. (2) An alternating group of degree at least 5. (3) A simple group of Lie type, including both (4) the classical Lie groups, namely the simple groups related to the projective special linear, unitary, symplectic, or orthogonal transformations over a finite field; (5) the exceptional and twisted groups of Lie type (including the Tits group). (6) One of the 26 sporadic simple groups.
Save it to: srdoty_alg_simple-gps_359.lean
